goal.ch:
課程目標本課程幫助學生 
1. 習得正式英語。
2. 模擬商務情境，如會議、社交、電話、協商、簡報、面試等。 
3. 接觸商務個案及討論商業困境和決策，以提供學生表達觀點、訓練口說應對能力、與他人協同解決問題的機會。
4. 瞭解不同文化的差異，擴大同理心。 
5. 培養英語口說的習慣及自信心。 
6. 加強學生商用英語字/詞彙、片語、表達法及句型的建構。
goal.en: This course is structured to help upper-intermediate learners improve their workplace English proficiency with a focus on three aspects of the language: speaking techniques, listening competence, and vocabulary power, in order of priority. Through task-based learning materials and authentic case studies, students can learn to communicate real meaning in natural context, which naturally offers them opportunities to develop their subject matter knowledge, critical thinking skills, managerial capability, and most importantly the focused language acquisition. Upon completion of the course, students will be able to communicate more diplomatically, thereby more skillfully and effectively, demonstrating functional language in everyday workplace scenarios towards problem-solving ability.
